column1: All implants, instruments and prosthesis are excluded from the package and should be charged separately
Transfusion of blood or and blood components are excluded and should be charged separately
Discharge prescription (medication) are excluded and should be charged separately
All medical complication (abnormal and unexpected) which is related or not related to the package operation are excluded from the package and should be charged separately
All costly medication (more than 300 SR / unite / day) are excluded from the package and should be charged separately
Prophylactic drug therapy (vaccination), excluded from the package and should be charged separately.
Any investigations recommended by MOH, or according to our accreditations standards (JCI, CBAHI…….etc.)Excluded from the package and should be charged separately

Any special investigation which are Laboratory (e.g. HIV, HCV, HBC….etc)and / or radiology (e.g. MRI / CT / ECHO / THALIUM / GIT ENDOSCOPY…. Etc.) which do not directly belong to the surgical procedure are excluded and should be charged separately
Accomodation difference should be payed separately
Any chronic disease which should be monitored and / or treated before the operation (e.g. DM, HTN, BA…etc.) package deal will start from the first day of operation performed
Any extra consultation requested by the treating doctor which related or not related to the surgical procedure is excluded and should be charged separately

Extra days stay in the hospital due to any medical condition which is related or not related to the surgical procedure, than the agreed period specified in the package deal list are excluded and should be charged separately

Admission to specialized care units (ICU, CCU, PICU, NICU, EMERGENCY UNITE) for any medical reason which is related or not related to the surgical procedure should be excluded from the package and should be charged separately
Any procedure related or not related to the surgical procedures (hemodialysis, CPR,…etc.) are excluded and should be charged separately
Mode of transportation to or from the hospital is excluded and should be charged separately
In case that the preoperative investigation done as outpatient, then the operation cancelled upon the his request, the preoperative investigation will be charged and should be paid by the company

Any description of packge inluding implants, instruments and prosthesis, it's the service of insertion such implants , instrument or the prosthesiS not the cost of the implants, instruments and prosthesis
